sections.title: Discover the Thrill of Student Formula Racing at HKUST
sections.description:
Student Formula Racing is an exhilarating platform where engineering students apply their skills in real-world scenarios.

Formula Student is Europe's most established educational engineering competition which uses motorsport to inspire students.

It requires teams to design, build, test, and race a Formula-style race car while making sure that there is a sound business model to back up a hypothetical mass-production line.

sections.title: Engineering Excellence Through Practical Experience
sections.description:
Our team members gain hands-on experience in designing, building, and testing race cars. This practical approach to learning creates well-rounded engineers ready for industry challenges.

Throughout the development, we aim to provide a platform for students to learn by doing and step out of their comfort zone, so as to explore what they are truly capable of and mature further.

sections.title: Join Our Journey to Racing Success
sections.description:
